mapper.insert: insert into users (id, pw, nick, name, birth, reg, email, phone, carrier) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{nick}, #{name}, #{birth}, sysdate, #{email}, #{phone}, #{carrier})
mapper.select: select * from users where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
select id from users where email = #{email}
select pw from users where id = #{id} and email = #{email}
mapper.update: update users set pw=#{pw} where id=#{id} and email=#{email}
mapper.select: select * from ( select b.*, rownum r from ( select * from users order by reg desc ) b ) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
select * from ( select b.*, rownum r from ( select * from users where lower(nick) like '%' || lower(trim(#{keyword})) || '%' order by reg desc ) b ) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
select count(*) from users where lower(nick) like '%' || lower(trim(#{keyword})) || '%'
